'''Beta 1.2.0.9''' (also known as '''1.2 build 3''') is the third build released for [[Bedrock Edition 1.2.0|1.2.0]] that fixed bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004125092|title=Minecraft Win10/Android Beta - 1.2 Build 3}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* [[Name tags]] should again work as expected.
* Fixed a crash when connecting to servers.{{Info needed|What crash, exactly?}}</onlyinclude>
